author: jstrachan
msg: Added patch from Paul Michael Reilly to add support for ButtonGroup. Thanks Paul!

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch to fix nesting of <x:element> and <x:attribute> tags as well as new JellyUnit test cases to test it

author: jstrachan
msg: Update to the correct version of xml-apis as well as regenerated the Ant build

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixes for the GUMP build. We now use the latest commons-collections library 2.1 to remove deprecation warnings
Also moved to OJB 0.9.6 to avoid compile errors

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a new helper tag, <util:available> which can be used to test for files or URIs being available and conditionally executing its body.
so its like a simplified version of the <available> Ant task without requiring the use of a seperate property to define whether the file is available or not.
